MeteringPointId.description: Identifier for a physical metering point (MPID)

TariffKey.description: A key for the grid tariff that is unique within the grid company.

TimeInterval.description: A time interval where startTime is included and the interval is up until endTime but not included.

startTime.description: The start time of this resolution period.

endTime.description: The time when this resolution period is expired.

Duration.description:
A time duration in the format [ISO 8601 duration format](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601#Durations).
Examples:
- "P1D" for one day
- "P1M" for one month
- "P2W" for two weeks
- "P3Y6M4DT12H30M5S" for a complex duration.

Currency.description: The currency for all related prices.

Unit.description: The unit of a measurement or price calculation.
